ADVICE_10_BODYTEXT.message: B'fhéidir nár mhiste duit athlonnú go dtí faicsean eile nuair a bhíonn tú i dtrioblóid leis na húdaráis áitiúla.

ADVICE_11_BODYTEXT.message: Make sure you know the surface gravity of a planet before you even think of landing on it.

ADVICE_11_HEADLINE.description: A reference to the song 'The Harder They Come', by Jimmy Cliff
ADVICE_11_HEADLINE.message: The harder the g, the harder the fall

ADVICE_1_BODYTEXT.description: Point made is: the real illegal goods traders are fixed to each station, but police's fake illegal goods traders will be random every time.
ADVICE_1_BODYTEXT.message: As you return to a station, be wary of those alternative market places you do not recognize, and you will stay out of trouble with the law.

ADVICE_2_BODYTEXT.message: Tá go leor turas gearr níos sciobtha ná turas fada amháin.

ADVICE_2_HEADLINE.description: (A reference to the famous poem The Road Not Taken, by Robert Frost)

ADVICE_3_BODYTEXT.description: (it simply says, to have enough fuel to leave a place where there is no possibility to refuel)
ADVICE_3_BODYTEXT.message: Ná léim go dtí réaltchóras neamháitrithe gan na acmhainní le filleadh.

ADVICE_3_HEADLINE.message: Ná bí fágtha ar an bpláinéad folamh: ba cheart duit do sheicheamh léimeanna a phleanáil roimh ré

ADVICE_4_BODYTEXT.message: Roghnaigh do fhráma tagartha, go háirithe nuair a bhíonn tú ag iarraidh luas agus cúrsa na sprice a mheaitseáil.

ADVICE_5_BODYTEXT.message: Ceannaigh ar phraghas íseal, díol ar phraghas ard.

ADVICE_6_BODYTEXT.message: Éist go cúramach leis an nuacht toisc go dtéann eolas nua i bhfeidhm ar phraghsanna an mhargaidh uaireanta.

ADVICE_7_BODYTEXT.message: Is féidir leat dea-chlú i measc an phobail a ghnóthú trí dheontais a thabhairt do chumainn charthanachta áirithe.

ADVICE_8_BODYTEXT.message: Nuair a thugann tú cuairt ar chóras déréalta, deimhnigh go bhfuil tú dírithe ar an réalta cheart.

ADVICE_9_BODYTEXT.message: Déan cothabháil ar do chuid inneall go rialta, ach meabhraigh go bhfaigheann tú luach do chuid airgid.

ADVICE_9_HEADLINE.message: Caith go maith le do long

RUMOUR_1_BODYTEXT.message: Someone in the Federal Navy told me that one day, one of their corvettes accidentally jumped to a Haber outpost system about 50ly out from Sol, called Rondel; almost causing open conflict. Not many people seem to know about the incident itself outside of the navy, but some say Rondel administration has been more aggressive towards visitors since, and freight pilots started avoiding the system.

TALE_1_BODYTEXT.message: Ná caill an t-éiclips álainn ar an Dóchas Nua nuair a uraíonn Háidéas an solas ó Eipsealón Eridani.

TALE_1_HEADLINE.message: "Ní chreidfeá na rudaí atá feicthe agam"
